Posts.EditableText: You can keep an eye on the very latest development version in CodePlex - you can browse the source at http://quest.codeplex.com/SourceControl/list/changesets and you can find English.aslx in WorldModel\WorldModel\Core\Languages

Posts.EditableText: About English.aslx, please, we need to know: do you update it ONLY at every new release of Quest?
Posts.HTML: About English.aslx, please, we need to know: do you update it ONLY at every new release of Quest?

Posts.EditableText:
Correct - there's no way for it to be updated except as part of a Quest release.

At the moment anyway... but it might be nice to have some way of updating the Core libraries (or maybe just the translations) outside of the main Quest release cycle. Not something that's going to happen very soon though.
